name: hypermetabolism
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
unusually high metabolic activity (= the chemical processes within the body required for life): The child may have a good appetite but does not gain weight because of hypermetabolism. Most investigators claim that hyper-metabolism in these regions of the brain produces obsessions and compulsions.
More examplesFewer examplesAspects of hypermetabolism can last for a day or more.It could have been predicted that regional hypermetabolism in patients with OCD would normalize after successful antiobsessional therapy.These drugs in combination attenuate systemic inflammation, hypermetabolism, and weight loss.
